meals.name: Protein Oatmeal Bowl
meals.preparation: Cook oats with almond milk, stir in protein powder, top with sliced banana, chia seeds, and drizzle of honey.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
meals.preparation: Layer Greek yogurt with granola and fresh berries. Drizzle with honey.

meals.name: Egg White Veggie Omelette
meals.preparation: Sauté vegetables, pour in beaten egg whites, add feta, fold when set.

meals.name: Avocado Toast with Eggs
meals.preparation: Toast bread, mash avocado on top, add poached or fried eggs, garnish with tomatoes.

meals.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
meals.preparation: Grill seasoned chicken breast, slice and serve over mixed greens with vegetables and lemon olive oil dressing.

meals.name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
meals.preparation: Cook quinoa, roast vegetables, combine in bowl with chickpeas, spinach, hummus and tahini drizzle.

meals.name: Turkey Wrap
meals.preparation: Layer turkey, vegetables, and avocado on wrap with mustard, roll tightly.

meals.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
meals.preparation: Mix tuna with Greek yogurt and diced celery, serve on whole grain bread with lettuce.

meals.name: Salmon with Sweet Potato
meals.preparation: Bake salmon with lemon and garlic, serve with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli.

meals.name: Lean Beef Stir Fry
meals.preparation: Stir fry beef with vegetables in ginger and soy sauce, serve over brown rice.

meals.name: Grilled Chicken with Vegetables
meals.preparation: Grill seasoned chicken breast, serve with grilled mixed vegetables.

meals.name: Shrimp and Veggie Pasta
meals.preparation: Cook pasta, sauté shrimp with garlic, tomatoes and spinach, combine and toss with olive oil.

meals.name: Turkey Meatballs with Zoodles
meals.preparation: Bake turkey meatballs, serve over spiralized zucchini with marinara and parmesan.

meals.name: Protein Shake
meals.preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt with Nuts
meals.preparation: Top Greek yogurt with mixed nuts and a drizzle of honey.

meals.name: Apple with Almond Butter
meals.preparation: Slice apple and serve with almond butter for dipping.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese with Fruit
meals.preparation: Top cottage cheese with fresh or canned fruit.

meals.name: Veggie Sticks with Hummus
meals.preparation: Cut vegetables into sticks and serve with hummus.

meals.name: Hard Boiled Eggs
meals.preparation: Boil eggs for 10 minutes, cool, peel, and season.

meals.name: Overnight Oats
meals.preparation: Mix oats, milk, chia seeds, and maple syrup. Refrigerate overnight. Top with berries.
